name: ThunderADA.app
description: ThunderADA.app is a double reward reflection token using the power of 80/20: 80% invest for now and mid term, 20% for long term future. Hold $THUNDERADA tokens and get rewarded 20% in ADA (8% per buy & 12% per sell) and 5% in THOREUM (2% per buy & 3% per sell), automatically delivered to wallet every 60 minutes. ThunderADA.app is a part of Thunder Alliance Ecosystem together with Thoreum, ThunderCake, ThunderBNB, supporting each other's price, increasing rarity & adding values together.
